home.title: ReRank AI
home.subtitle: From preventing ranking drops to boosting rankings, AI automatically identifies differences.
home.loginWithGoogle: Sign in with Google to get started
home.heroSubtitle:
Simply connect with Google Search Console, and AI will detect ranking drops and automatically suggest improvements.
Optimized for AI search (AIO).
home.ctaButton: Get Started Free with Google Account
home.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

feature1.title: Automatic Rank Monitoring
feature1.description: Automatically checks rankings daily and immediately notifies you when drops are detected

feature2.title: Competitor Analysis
feature2.description: Automatically analyzes top-ranking competitor sites and identifies missing content

feature3.title: AI Improvement Suggestions
feature3.description: Gemini AI compares your articles with competitor articles and proposes specific improvements

step1.title: Connect with Google Search Console
step1.description: Sign in with your Google account and select a Search Console property

step2.title: Select an Article
step2.description: Select or enter the URL of the article you want to analyze

step3.title: AI Automatically Analyzes
step3.description: AI analyzes ranking data and proposes improvements based on differences with competitors

home.selectPropertyDescription: Please select the Search Console property of the site you want to analyze.
home.analyzeArticleDescription: Enter the article URL to retrieve ranking data, analyze differences with competitors, and get improvement suggestions.

chart.dropDetectedMessage: This page was not found in actual search results.
chart.lastPositionInGSC: In GSC, it was last at position {position}, but it may have dropped below 100th place now.
chart.noDataForKeyword: No data was retrieved for this keyword.
chart.lastRecordedPosition: The last recorded position was {position}, but it may have dropped below 100th place now.
chart.daysSinceLastData: {days} days have passed since the last data retrieval.
chart.gscDataNote: Google search results only record data for pages displayed within the top 100. If there is a period when data is not retrieved, the ranking may have dropped below 100th place in search results.

gsc.noAccessRights: This Google account does not have access rights to Search Console properties.

gsc.solution2: Request access rights to existing properties
gsc.solution3: Sign in with another Google account that has access rights to properties

article.articleUrlHint: Select from the article list above or enter the URL directly

results.aiSEONoMissingElements: ‚úÖ All AI SEO elements are present

auth.title: Get Started by Linking with Google Search Console
auth.description: Retrieve your site's ranking data and automatically analyze and suggest improvements
auth.accountInfo: About the Google Account to Use
auth.accountInfoDescription: Please sign in with a Google account that has access rights to Search Console properties.
auth.accountInfoNote: Accounts without rights cannot retrieve site ranking data.
auth.step3: Enter article URL and start analysis
auth.noAccessRightsTitle: If you don't have access rights to Search Console properties
auth.noAccessRightsDescription: Add a site in Search Console or request access rights to existing properties.

errors.propertyNotSelected: Search Console property is not selected
errors.tokenExpired: Authentication token has expired. Please sign in again.

notification.dropReasonKeywords: Keywords such as "{keywords}" have dropped below 10th place

articles.title: Articles
articles.averagePositionDescription: Current average position. Shows the average ranking across multiple keywords over the past 7 days (can be changed in alert settings).
articles.autoCheckDescription: Automatically check this article's ranking daily and notify you when it drops
articles.updateEmailNotificationFailed: Failed to update email notification setting
articles.updateSlackNotificationFailed: Failed to update Slack notification setting

checker.fixedArticle: Article is marked as fixed and within cooldown period ({days} days), notification skipped
checker.recentNotification: Notification was sent within the past {days} days, skipping ({daysAgo} days ago)
checker.noConsecutiveDrop: Consecutive drop for {days} days not confirmed

email.subject: [ReRank AI] Rank drop detected
email.header: ReRank AI - Rank Drop Detection Report
email.referenceCompetitorSites: Reference: Competitor sites with this content
email.footer: ReRank AI - From preventing ranking drops to boosting rankings

settings.startMonitoringDescription: We will automatically check this article's rankings daily and send you an email notification if the rankings drop.
settings.slackWebhookUrlDescription: Enter your Slack Incoming Webhook URL
settings.slackWebhookUrlHelp: Create a Slack Incoming Webhook and get the URL
settings.connectSlackDescription: Click the button to log in with your Slack account and complete notification settings
settings.slackConnectionRequiredForNotification: To enable Slack notifications, you need to complete Slack connection first. Do you want to go to the connection page?
settings.notificationRequired: Please select either email notification or Slack notification
settings.greetingMessage:
Connected to ReRank AI.

From now on, we will send notifications to this channel (or DM) when we detect rank drops for your articles.

You can change notification settings or view details from the dashboard.
settings.notificationTimeDescription: We will check rankings daily at this time (default: 9:00 AM)
settings.title: Settings

alertSettings.title: Alert Settings
alertSettings.description: Customize rank change (drop and rise) detection conditions. Notifications are sent for both rank drops and rank rises.

dropConditions.title: Drop Detection Conditions
dropConditions.positionDropThresholdDescription: Notify when the current average position drops by this value or more compared to the comparison period average. Rank rises are also notified using the same threshold (e.g., if set to 2, notifications are sent for drops or rises of 2 positions or more). Can be set in 0.1 increments.
dropConditions.keywordDropThresholdDescription: Notify when any keyword related to the article drops to this position or below. If multiple keywords meet the condition, all of them will be included in the notification

comparisonPeriod.title: Comparison Period
comparisonPeriod.description: Use the average position over this period as the baseline to compare with the current average position

notificationFrequency.title: Notification Frequency
notificationFrequency.description: Select the notification frequency. Since Search Console data is updated once per day, notifications are sent during daily checks when rank drops are detected

consecutiveDropDays.title: Consecutive Drop Days
consecutiveDropDays.description: Notify when rank has dropped for this many consecutive days

minImpressions.title: Minimum Impressions
minImpressions.description: Only keywords with this many impressions or more will be included in notifications

notificationCooldownDays.title: Notification Cooldown
notificationCooldownDays.description: Do not send notifications for the same article within this number of days. If set to 0, the cooldown is disabled
